title: Superglue, Bike Locks, Powder Cannons: Court Hearing Reveals Wild Details of How Protesters Halted Road Worlds
content:
Three climate protesters walk free, one fined after they put pause on men's road race for more than 50 minutes.

Read the full article at Superglue, Bike Locks, Powder Cannons: Court Hearing Reveals Wild Details of How Protesters Halted Road Worlds on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
